CHAT.comment: child covers his eyes.
INV brings toy car into room.
child opens his eyes
mom opens hood of car and then child does it.
mom holds her hand upright on table.
child makes unintelligible noises.
child points to hood of car.
mom makes noise like car being filled up.
child holds five fingers up.
child holds up five fingers.
mom makes sound like she's filling car up and counts in between.
child starts driving car away.
child grabs mom's hand to act as gas pump.
child holds up five fingers.
child grabs mom's other hand and moves it next to the car.
child moves mom's hand over the car.
mom laughs and wipes child's nose.
child lifts up hood of car.
mom makes noises and dings and child closes hood.
mom and child laugh.
child closes hood on mom's finger a few times and mom makes coughing noises.
mom makes noises and coughs many times as child closes hood on her fingers.
child goes over to couch and covers his eyes.
INV brings degu into room.
child opens his eyes.
INV leaves room.
child knocks on side of cage.
child makes barking noises and scratching his ear.
child makes noises at degu.
mom holds up two fingers on each hand.
degu runs around cage frantically.
INV takes degu from room
child goes to walk over to mom and falls off of chair.
INV brings meerkat into room.
child moves over and grabs meerkat.
child grabs meerkat from mom's hands.
mom puts meerkat under the table.
child finds meerkat under the table.
child places meerkat near fish tank.
mom gets up and starts looking around the table.
mom puts meerkat under couch.
child gets up and starts looking around room.
child moves away from meerkat.
child climbs on couch to look behind it.
child grabs meerkat's face and kisses it numerous times.
child grabs meerkat and gives it lots of kisses.
child puts meerkat under couch.
mom walks meerkat over to table.
child hits meerkat.
child goes to hit meerkat.
child grabs meerkat and hits him.
child goes to hit meerkat.
child tickles meerkat and makes high pitched noises.
child and mom move over to fish tank.
mom and child whisper about three sentences that are unintelligible.
child taps lightly on the glass.
mom brings child to side of tank.
child walks away from the tank.
child walks over to computer box.
child goes over to computer box and plays with it and it starts to make noise.
computer box beeps.
child plays with computer box for a bit and is surprised by what it does.
mom and child put hands over top of computer box and it lights up.
child covers up some lights and mom and child laugh.
mom wipes child's mouth off.
mom makes noise to imitate computer box.
child walks away from computer box.
child returns to computer box.
child walks over to Robodog and then goes back to couch.
mom and child go over to Robodog.
child and mom talk to robodog.
child picks up Robodog and moves it to middle of room.
child bends Robodog's tail and it perks it's head up.
child picks up Robodog and puts it in middle of room.
child utters unintelligible phrase while bending Robodog's tail.
child picks up Robodog and puts it on the table.
mom puts Robodog on floor.
child puts Robodog in mom's lap.
child goes over to blue chair and picks it up.
child brings chair over to mom and Robodog and mom makes eating sounds.
mom holds out her hands to child.
INV takes Robodog from room.
